8 namespace planning {
9 struct RotationCommand {
10 public:
11  enum CommandType { FacePoint, FaceAngle, None };
12 
13  virtual ~RotationCommand() = default;
14 
15  CommandType get_command_type() const { return command_type_; }
16 
17  [[nodiscard]] virtual std::string print() const = 0;
18 
19  friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream,
20  const RotationCommand& rot_cmd) {
21  stream << rot_cmd.print();
22  return stream;
23  }
24 
25 protected:
26  RotationCommand(CommandType command) : command_type_(command) {}
27 
28 private:
29  const CommandType command_type_;
30 };
31 
32 struct FacePointCommand : public RotationCommand {
33  explicit FacePointCommand(rj_geometry::Point target)
34  : RotationCommand(FacePoint), target_pos(target) {}
35 
36  const rj_geometry::Point target_pos;
37 
38  [[nodiscard]] std::string print() const override {
39  std::stringstream ss;
40  ss << "FacePointCommand(" << target_pos << ")";
41  return ss.str();
42  }
43 };
44 
45 struct FaceAngleCommand : public RotationCommand {
46  explicit FaceAngleCommand(float radians)
47  : RotationCommand(FaceAngle), target_angle(radians) {}
48 
49  const float target_angle;
50 
51  [[nodiscard]] std::string print() const override {
52  std::stringstream ss;
53  ss << "FaceAngleCommand(" << target_angle << ")";
54  return ss.str();
55  }
56 };
57 
58 struct EmptyAngleCommand : public RotationCommand {
59  EmptyAngleCommand() : RotationCommand(None) {}
60 
61  [[nodiscard]] std::string print() const override {
62  return "EmptyAngleCommand()";
63  }
64 };
